name: Trick or Treat (itch) (Lolscrubs)
description:
Trick or Treat is a short home invasion horror game about Halloween. It's Halloween night and you're home alone. Your parents have gone out and you want to spend the evening on Discord playing some games with friends, but everything takes a turn when the doorbell rings...

This game has 2 endings.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • MOUSE - Look
  • E - Interact
  • SPACE - leave hiding
